author: Phil Vickery
method: Heat the olive oil in a saucepan over a medium heat. Add the chilli flakes and ground coriander and cook for one minute. Add the cherry tomatoes and brown sugar and cook for a further 8-10 minutes. Stir in the chopped walnuts and coriander. Stir in the butter and serve.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ tsp chilli flakes,  ½ tsp ground coriander,  1 x 400g/14oz tin cherry tomatoes,  2 tbsp brown sugar,  25g/1oz walnuts, chopped,  3 tbsp fresh coriander, chopped,  2 tbsp butter
